1: מַשָּׂ֖א <sup>4853 </sup> <n>The burden</n> נִֽינְוֵ֑ה <sup>5210 </sup> <n>of Nineveh</n> סֵ֧פֶר <sup>5612 </sup> <n>The book</n> חֲז֛וֹן <sup>2377 </sup> <n>of the vision</n> נַח֖וּם <sup>5151 </sup> <n>of Nahum</n> הָאֶלְקֹשִֽׁי׃ <sup>512 </sup> <n>the Elkoshite</n>
2: אֵ֣ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> קַנּ֤וֹא <sup>7072 </sup> <n>[is] jealous</n> וְנֹקֵם֙ <sup>5358 </sup> <n>revengeth</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> נֹקֵ֥ם <sup>5358 </sup> <n>revengeth</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> וּבַ֣עַל <sup>1167 </sup> <n>archer</n> חֵמָ֑ה <sup>2534 </sup> <n>wrath</n> נֹקֵ֤ם <sup>5358 </sup> <n>will take vengeance</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> לְצָרָ֔יו <sup>6862 </sup> <n>on his adversaries</n> וְנוֹטֵ֥ר <sup>5201 </sup> <n>and he reserveth</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לְאֹיְבָֽיו׃ <sup>341 </sup> <n>[wrath] for his enemies</n>
3: יְהֹוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> אֶ֤רֶךְ <sup>750 </sup> <n>[is] slow</n> אַפַּ֙יִם֙ <sup>639 </sup> <n>to anger</n> [וּגְדֹול־ כ] (וּגְדָל־ <sup>1419 </sup> <n>and great</n> כֹּ֔חַ <sup>1419 </sup> <n>and great</n> ק) וְנַקֵּ֖ה <sup>5352 </sup> <n>and will not at all</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יְנַקֶּ֑ה <sup>5352 </sup> <n>acquit</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[the wicked] the LORD</n> בְּסוּפָ֤ה <sup>5492 </sup> <n>in the whirlwind</n> וּבִשְׂעָרָה֙ <sup>8183 </sup> <n>and in the storm</n> דַּרְכּ֔וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>hath his way</n> וְעָנָ֖ן <sup>6051 </sup> <n>and the clouds</n> אֲבַ֥ק <sup>80 </sup> <n>[are] the dust</n> רַגְלָֽיו׃ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>of his feet</n>
4: גּוֹעֵ֤ר <sup>1605 </sup> <n>He rebuketh</n> בַּיָּם֙ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>the sea</n> וַֽיַּבְּשֵׁ֔הוּ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>and drieth up</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַנְּהָר֖וֹת <sup>5104 </sup> <n>all the rivers</n> הֶֽחֱרִ֑יב <sup>2717 </sup> <n>and maketh it dry</n> אֻמְלַ֤ל <sup>536 </sup> <n>weak</n> בָּשָׁן֙ <sup>1316 </sup> <n>Bashan</n> וְכַרְמֶ֔ל <sup>3760 </sup> <n>and Carmel</n> וּפֶ֥רַח <sup>6525 </sup> <n>and the flower</n> לְבָנ֖וֹן <sup>3844 </sup> <n>of Lebanon</n> אֻמְלָֽל׃ <sup>536 </sup> <n>weak</n>
5: הָרִים֙ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>The mountains</n> רָעֲשׁ֣וּ <sup>7493 </sup> <n>quake</n> מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>because</n> וְהַגְּבָע֖וֹת <sup>1389 </sup> <n>at him and the hills</n> הִתְמֹגָ֑גוּ <sup>4127 </sup> <n>melt</n> וַתִּשָּׂ֤א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>is burned</n> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and the earth</n> מִפָּנָ֔יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>at his presence</n> וְתֵבֵ֖ל <sup>8398 </sup> <n>yea the world</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and all that dwell</n> בָֽהּ׃
6: לִפְנֵ֤י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> זַעְמוֹ֙ <sup>2195 </sup> <n>angry</n> מִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> יַֽעֲמ֔וֹד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>Who can stand</n> וּמִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> יָק֖וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>endure</n> בַּחֲר֣וֹן <sup>2740 </sup> <n>in the fierceness</n> אַפּ֑וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>anger</n> חֲמָתוֹ֙ <sup>2534 </sup> <n>anger</n> נִתְּכָ֣ה <sup>5413 </sup> <n>is poured out</n> כָאֵ֔שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>like fire</n> וְהַצֻּרִ֖ים <sup>6697 </sup> <n>and the rocks</n> נִתְּצ֥וּ <sup>5422 </sup> <n>are thrown down</n> מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n>
7: ט֣וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[is] good</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> לְמָע֖וֹז <sup>4581 </sup> <n>a strong hold</n> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> צָרָ֑ה <sup>6869 </sup> <n>of trouble</n> וְיֹדֵ֖עַ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and he knoweth</n> חֹ֥סֵי <sup>2620 </sup> <n>them that trust</n> בֽוֹ׃
8: וּבְשֶׁ֣טֶף <sup>7858 </sup> <n>flood</n> עֹבֵ֔ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>But with an overrunning</n> כָּלָ֖ה <sup>3617 </sup> <n>an utter end</n> יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>he will make</n> מְקוֹמָ֑הּ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>of the place</n> וְאֹיְבָ֖יו <sup>341 </sup> <n>his enemies</n> יְרַדֶּף־ <sup>7291 </sup> <n>shall pursue</n> חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>thereof and darkness</n>
9: מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>Whatever</n> תְּחַשְּׁבוּן֙ <sup>2803 </sup> <n>What do ye imagine</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> כָּלָ֖ה <sup>3617 </sup> <n>an utter end</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>He</n> עֹשֶׂ֑ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>will make</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> תָק֥וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>shall not rise up</n> פַּעֲמַ֖יִם <sup>6471 </sup> <n>the second time</n> צָרָֽה׃ <sup>6869 </sup> <n>affliction</n>
10: כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>Like</n> סִירִ֣ים <sup>5518 </sup> <n>[as] thorns</n> סְבֻכִ֔ים <sup>5440 </sup> <n>For while [they be] folden together</n> וּכְסָבְאָ֖ם <sup>5435 </sup> <n>[as] drunkards</n> סְבוּאִ֑ים <sup>5433 </sup> <n>and while they are drunken</n> אֻ֨כְּל֔וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>they shall be devoured</n> כְּקַ֥שׁ <sup>7179 </sup> <n>as stubble</n> יָבֵ֖שׁ <sup>3002 </sup> <n>dry</n> מָלֵֽא׃ <sup>4390 </sup> <n>accomplish</n>
11: מִמֵּ֣ךְ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> יָצָ֔א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>There is [one] come out</n> חֹשֵׁ֥ב <sup>2803 </sup> <n>of thee that imagineth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>against the LORD</n> רָעָ֑ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n> יֹעֵ֖ץ <sup>3289 </sup> <n>counsellor</n> בְּלִיָּֽעַל׃ <sup>1100 </sup> <n>a wicked</n> ס
12: כֹּ֣ה ׀ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>Though</n> שְׁלֵמִים֙ <sup>8003 </sup> <n>Though [they be] quiet</n> וְכֵ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>and likewise</n> רַבִּ֔ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and likewise many</n> וְכֵ֥ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> נָגֹ֖זּוּ <sup>1494 </sup> <n>yet thus shall they be cut down</n> וְעָבָ֑ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>when he shall pass through</n> וְעִ֨נִּתִ֔ךְ <sup>6031 </sup> <n>Though I have afflicted</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> אֲעַנֵּ֖ךְ <sup>6031 </sup> <n>thee I will afflict</n> עֽוֹד׃ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n>
13: וְעַתָּ֕ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> אֶשְׁבֹּ֥ר <sup>7665 </sup> <n>For now will I break</n> מֹטֵ֖הוּ <sup>4132 </sup> <n>his yoke</n> מֵֽעָלָ֑יִךְ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וּמוֹסְרֹתַ֖יִךְ <sup>4147 </sup> <n>thy bonds</n> אֲנַתֵּֽק׃ <sup>5423 </sup> <n>in sunder</n>
14: וְצִוָּ֤ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>hath given a commandment</n> עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will no</n> יִזָּרַ֥ע <sup>2232 </sup> <n>be sown</n> מִשִּׁמְךָ֖ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>concerning thee [that] no more of thy name</n> ע֑וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> מִבֵּ֨ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>out of the house</n> אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of thy gods</n> אַכְרִ֨ית <sup>3772 </sup> <n>will I cut off</n> פֶּ֧סֶל <sup>6459 </sup> <n>the graven image</n> וּמַסֵּכָ֛ה <sup>4541 </sup> <n>and the molten image</n> אָשִׂ֥ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>I will make</n> קִבְרֶ֖ךָ <sup>6913 </sup> <n>thy grave</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> קַלּֽוֹתָ׃ <sup>7043 </sup> <n>for thou art vile</n> פ
15: הִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הֶהָרִ֜ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>Behold upon the mountains</n> רַגְלֵ֤י <sup>7272 </sup> <n>the feet</n> מְבַשֵּׂר֙ <sup>1319 </sup> <n>of him that bringeth good tidings</n> מַשְׁמִ֣יעַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>that publisheth</n> שָׁל֔וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peace</n> חָגִּ֧י <sup>2287 </sup> <n>keep</n> יְהוּדָ֛ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>O Judah</n> חַגַּ֖יִךְ <sup>2282 </sup> <n>thy solemn feasts</n> שַׁלְּמִ֣י <sup>7999 </sup> <n>perform</n> נְדָרָ֑יִךְ <sup>5088 </sup> <n>thy vows</n> כִּי֩ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֨א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יוֹסִ֥יף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>shall no more</n> ע֛וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> [לַעֲבֹור־ כ] (לַֽעֲבָר־ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>pass</n> בָּ֥ךְ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>pass through</n> ק) בְּלִיַּ֖עַל <sup>1100 </sup> <n>for the wicked</n> כֻּלֹּ֥ה <sup>3605 </sup> <n>completely</n> נִכְרָֽת׃ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>thee he is utterly cut off</n>
